name: Legendary Creatures Series | Karakoncolos
description: Karakoncolos is a malevolent goblin in Southeastern European and Anatolian folklore. Stories about the Karakoncolos or its equivalents can be found in Greece, Bulgaria, Serbia, Albania, and Bosnia. It’s appearance looks similar to a bear or bigfoot. Although it does not harmful, it’s appearance causes panic amongst the people. In the coldest nights of the winter, he wanders across the street, asking everyone who saw where are they coming from and where are they going to. The answers to be given must include the word "kara". Such as: I am coming from Karasu, going to Karakısla. When this is not done accurately, Karakoncolos hits the person in front of him with a huge comb in his hand. In order to be protected from him, the combs in the houses are not left in the middle of the house.
